name: Recommended
description: My favorite options! React with the emoji associated with an item to see more information or purchase.

items.name: *Family Logo Tag* -- Best Seller
items.description: Tired of the [B], [C], [F], [H], or [P]? Well you're in luck. Replace it today with your family's emoji logo!

items.name: *Higher XP I* -- Best Seller
items.description: Increases average XP per message, and maximum XP possible per message. `$info higher` can tell you more information.

items.name: Greg Wordle Minigame
items.description: Play my very own Wordle minigame using $wordle!

name: Boosters
description: Get more XP per message with these timed XP boosters!

items.name: *Higher XP I* -- Best Seller
items.description: Increases average XP per message, and maximum XP possible per message. `$info higher` can tell you more information.

items.name: Higher XP II
items.description: Increases average XP more per message, and maximum XP possible more per message. `$info higher` can tell you more information.

items.name: Higher XP III
items.description: Increases average XP even more per message, and maximum XP possible even more per message. `$info higher` can tell you more information. *Brand new with Greg 3.0!*

name: Minigames
description: Try your luck and test your brain with fun games!

items.name: Expanded Fields
items.description: `$plant` 3 crops at once, tripling your yield!

items.name: Silo Security Lvl 1
items.description: Hire the town Strongman to defend your silo from the silo thief (`$info thief`). It's not guarunteed safety, the thief seems to get away with half as much crops vs no security.

items.name: Greg Wordle Minigame
items.description: Play my very own Wordle minigame using $wordle!

items.name: Wordle 2 (Hard Mode)
items.description: Wordle, but harder! Harder words, no purple letters, and play against Rose instead of Tom--all for Double XP.
items.warning: If you own Hard Mode *and* regular mode, the $wordle command will default to Hard Mode

name: Server Perks
description: Exclusive customization and perks for your family and server status.

items.name: *Family Logo Tag* -- Best Seller
items.description: Tired of the [B], [C], [F], [H], or [P]? Well you're in luck. Replace it today with your family's emoji logo!

items.name: Upgraded NH Role
items.description: Gives your Neighborhood role a glowing upgrade! Show off your status in style.

items.name: Holographic Role
items.description: Gain the exclusive, animated Holographic role. It's shiny, it's rare, it's flex-worthy.
items.warning: Same role as attained from Set 2 Task 4 in the '25 FF Fair
